title: Humanoid Robots Are Coming of Age
description: A few years ago, humanoid robots were clumsy and awkward. Now several startups claim to have models almost ready to go to work in warehouses and factories.

title: AI Is Steeped in Big Tech’s ‘Digital Colonialism’
description: Artificial intelligence continues to be fed racist and sexist training materials and then distributed around the world.

title: Internal Report Suggests Security Lapses at Hacked Crypto Exchange Bitfinex
description: A security review describes how attackers exploited mistakes to steal millions of dollars worth of bitcoin.

title: Pegasus Spyware Is Detected in a War Zone for the First Time
description: Researchers say Armenian government workers, journalists, and at least one United Nations official were targeted by the NSO tool.

title: Ron DeSantis Pushed Elon Musk's Twitter to Its Breaking Point
description: Launching his White House bid on the social network revealed the technical and political limitations of Musk's platform.
